description:
Up for anything, the Tropos 32L is a one-pack wonder for travel or everyday. Its suspended mesh back panel keeps you cool while effortlessly spreading the weight to the waistbelt and padded shoulder straps. A kickstand keeps the pack upright when you put it down in coffee shops and classrooms, and a dedicated laptop sleeve makes for easy access at airport security. A huge clamshell opening makes it easy to pack and unpack capsule wardrobes and daily essentials, while lots of pockets keep you organized. Where will it take you next?

  • Made of durable 420-denier recycled nylon with a PFC-free DWR finish
  • AirSpeed® suspended mesh back panel lets air flow through to your back to keep you cool
  • Webbing waistbelt can be deployed to help with heavy loads or removed when you don't need it
  • Integrated kickstand ensures the pack stays upright when you set it down
  • Wide clamshell zippered opening gives you easy access to the large main compartment
  • Secondary compartment has tons of internal organization with pockets and slots for pens, keys, cards and other items
  • Side stretch-mesh pockets hold water bottles or snacks
  • Front panel stretch shove-it pocket for stashing a jacket
  • Dedicated top-access zippered laptop sleeve is padded and set off the bottom of the pack to protect from drops
  • Blinky light loop ensures you'll be seen on after-dark bike commutes
name: Osprey Tropos 32 Daypack - Unisex
